questions.Q1: Is MUT INPUT a similar scenario compared with MUT TESTS?
questions.Q2: Does MUT INPUT cover more lines or branches than MUT TESTS?
questions.Q3: Will MUT work differently when executing under MUT INPUT? Reply YES, only if you are really sure about the bug. If you are not sure, reply NO.
questions.Q4: Does MUT still produce correct results when executing under MUT INPUT?
questions.Q5: Will MUT INPUT reveal any dangerous bug in MUT? Reply YES, only if you are really sure about the bug. If you are not sure, reply NO.

task: Given a MUT and a MUT INPUT, you should answer all questions in QUESTIONS. For each question, you should answer only YES or NO. Return results in a JSON dictionary, where the key is the question key and the value is the answer.
